feats.name: Kineticist Dedication
feats.description: You gain the ability to gather and shape elemental energy. Choose an element: air, earth, fire, metal, water, or wood. You gain an impulse attack with the element trait from a gate of your choice.

feats.name: Deity's Domain
feats.description: You embody an aspect of your deity. Choose one of your deity's domains from the list in their entry. You gain the domain's initial domain spell as a devotion spell.

feats.name: Devoted Guardian
feats.description: You've sworn to protect your allies with your shield. When you use the Shield Block reaction to protect an ally, if the ally takes any damage from the attack, you can reduce the damage they take by 2 + your level, and you increase the damage your shield takes by the same amount.

feats.name: Nimble Reprisal
feats.description: If an enemy misses you with a melee attack, you can use your reaction to Step away from that enemy. The enemy must remain within your reach throughout your Step to use this reaction.

feats.name: Shield Block
feats.description: You snap your shield in place to ward off a blow. You immediately use your shield's Hardness to reduce the damage you would take by that amount. Your shield takes the damage that was prevented in this way instead.

feats.name: Untrained Improvisation
feats.description: You've learned how to handle situations when you're out of your depth. Your proficiency bonus to untrained skill checks is equal to half your level instead of +0. If you're 7th level or higher, the bonus increases to your full level instead.

feats.name: Natural Ambition
feats.description: Your ambition knows no bounds, and you strive to learn as much as you can. You gain a 1st-level class feat.

feats.name: Hefty Hauler
feats.description: You can carry more than your frame implies. Increase your maximum Bulk by 2 and your encumbered Bulk by 2.

feats.name: Hobnobber
feats.description: You are skilled at learning information through conversation. The Gather Information exploration activity takes you half as long as normal (typically 1 hour instead of 2).

feats.name: Titan Wrestler
feats.description: You can attempt to Disarm, Grapple, Shove, or Trip creatures up to two sizes larger than you, and you don't take a circumstance penalty when targeting a creature that's one size larger than you with these actions.

inventory.name: Full Plate
inventory.description: Heavy armor that provides excellent protection at the cost of mobility.

inventory.name: Steel Shield (Sturdy, Minor)
inventory.description: A reinforced shield that can absorb more damage before breaking. Hardness 8, HP 64, BT 32

inventory.name: Longsword (+1)
inventory.description: A versatile blade that can be wielded with one or two hands. This sword has been magically enhanced to strike more accurately.

inventory.name: Holy Symbol
inventory.description: A silver symbol of Iomedae, the goddess of righteous valor, honor, and justice.

inventory.name: Healer's Tools
inventory.description: These bandages, herbs, and suturing tools are necessary for Medicine checks to Treat Wounds.

inventory.name: Adventurer's Pack
inventory.description: Includes backpack, bedroll, 10 pieces of chalk, flint and steel, 50 feet of rope, 2 weeks' rations, soap, 5 torches, and a waterskin.

notes.title: Oath of Devotion
notes.content: Today I swore my oath to Iomedae in the Cathedral of Absalom. The High Priest spoke of troubled times ahead and the need for champions to stand against the coming darkness. I will uphold the tenets of my oath: to be just, honorable, and merciful even to those who may not deserve it.

notes.title: Vision of Light
notes.content: During my evening prayers, I experienced a visionâ€”a flash of golden light and the silhouette of a sword pointing toward the northern mountains. Could this be a sign from Iomedae herself? I must consult with the temple elders about the significance of this vision.

tenets: You must act with honor, never cheating, lying, or taking advantage of others.
You must act with mercy, showing compassion to those who deserve it and seeking to convert those who don't to goodness.
You must be righteous, standing against the forces of evil wherever they might hide.

devotion_spells.name: Lay on Hands
devotion_spells.targets: 1 willing living creature or 1 undead creature
devotion_spells.description: Your hands become infused with positive energy, healing a living creature or damaging an undead creature with a touch. If you use lay on hands on a willing living target, you restore 6 Hit Points. If the target is one of your allies, they also gain a +2 status bonus to AC for 1 round. Against an undead target, you deal 1d6 damage and it must attempt a basic Fortitude save. This damage increases to 1d8 if you have master proficiency in Religion.

devotion_spells.name: Light of Revelation
devotion_spells.description: You shed a luminous aura, illuminating a 20-foot radius with bright light. Creatures in this area can't be concealed, though they can still be hidden. If a creature is currently undetected by a creature in the area, it becomes hidden to that creature instead.

reactions.name: Retributive Strike
reactions.trigger: An enemy damages an ally within 15 feet of you.
reactions.description: You protect your ally and strike your foe. The ally gains resistance to all damage against the triggering damage equal to 2 + your level. If the foe is within reach, make a melee Strike against it.

reactions.name: Shield Block
reactions.trigger: While you have your shield raised, you take damage from a physical attack.
reactions.description: You position your shield to ward off a blow. Your shield prevents you from taking an amount of damage up to the shield's Hardness. You and the shield each take any remaining damage, possibly breaking or destroying the shield.
